channel.title: Need help making first online server
channel.description:
well 1, (for any voters) when you register you're server on mopar's serverstatus and you login with the account given does that means it's public?(was moved but I was bugged for some reason because I logged on checking) think error below is why any helps appericated
- [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2q16wrs.png[/img] (any help + the failed to connected sql database is definent poblem
- will possibly be asking for more help, also (if this is allowed if not i'll remove link refer to down 2 more (-))
-I downloaded a server (source) + client, and I changed the client ip to mine as said aswell, and i'm not sure about the source i think the classes are my problem and i'm pretty sure I recompiled fully I think
Here is the client to my hoply public online server [URL=http://up.ht/NqJDWb]Project Rainbow [4.2a].rar - 17.4 MB[/URL] (clean file) nothing changed refer to Project Rainbow 500+ Downloads (lot's of new customs)
. thx in return possibly a rep if it helps with getting my bad boy server up and public
edit; anymore info if you need just let me know, Also you can forum PM me if they're is problems logging in or feel free to email @ datnigg743@hotmail.com
